scripts.release: tags=($(git tag -l --sort=-version:refname)); last_tag=${tags[0]}; echo "Last version: ${last_tag:1}"; read -p "New version: " version && export PKG_VERSION=$version && export PKG_LAST_TAG=$last_tag && export PKG_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && yarn commits
scripts.prerelease: yarn cleanup && yarn install && yarn test
scripts.push: read -r -p "Push ${PKG_BRANCH} to github? [y/N]";echo;if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]];then git push origin $PKG_BRANCH --tags && yarn publish . --new-version $PKG_VERSION;else yarn cleanup;fi;
scripts.cleanup: git tag -d $(git tag) && git fetch --all --tags && git clean --force -d -x && git reset --hard origin/main && git checkout main
